name: Conrad's Quest
description:
Meet Conrad the condor and help him in his dangerous quest through multiple levels and traps as he collects as many coins as he can (in a limited time) to help save his species from extinction.


*Multiple levels and traps, each increasing with intensity as you progress.
*Characters speed adjusted according to each level, to make it more challenging.
*Each level is made to test your mechanical skills, and made to push you to your limits.
*Fine tuned game timer to keep you under pressure.
*Main menu and in game volume adjustable to player preference.
